# Program Evaluation and Business Plan for Nature Inspiration Awards (NIA)
### Request for Proposal

**Reference:** cb-824-50018264
**Invitation Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Tender Status:** Expired

**Program Overview:**

The Canadian Museum of Nature (CMN) invites experienced and qualified firms to submit a proposal for a comprehensive performance evaluation of the Nature Inspiration Awards (NIA) program. The selected firm will lead stakeholder consultations, provide an options analysis and recommendation for the program's future, and build a business plan for the recommended option.

**Bid Requirements:**

* Registration on the Bonfire platform: [https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca](https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca)
* Mandatory electronic bid submission via Bonfire
* All documents must be accessed through [https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca](https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca)
* Contact information: Michelle Garber, [approvisionnement-procurement@nature.ca](mailto:approvisionnement-procurement@nature.ca), (613) 566-4240

**Program Evaluation Objectives:**

* Comprehensive performance evaluation of the NIA program
* Stakeholder consultations
* Options analysis and recommendation for the program's future
* Business plan development for the recommended option

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Technical merit
* Price

**Submission Requirements:**

* Electronic bids must be submitted on time to be considered
* Bids received after the specified deadline will not be accepted
* Registration on the Bonfire platform is mandatory
* Contact information and documents must be accessed through the specified website

**Late Bid Submissions:**

* Bids received after the specified deadline will not be considered
* All bidders must ensure electronic bid submission is completed by the deadline

**Important Instructions:**

* All bids must be submitted electronically through the Bonfire platform
* Registration on the Bonfire platform is mandatory for bid submission
* All documents must be accessed through [https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca](https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca)
* Technical assistance: [1-800-354-8010](tel:1-800-354-8010), ext. 2, or submit a request at [https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca/portal/support](https://cmn-mcn
